description: With Mr Chen's range of top-quality Asian ingredients, you'll be able to easily elevate your midweek cooking.
keywords: Honey Soy Noodles With Crispy Beef
name: Honey Soy Noodles With Crispy Beef Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Mr Chen's Pantry Soy Sauce
1 tbs Mr Chen's Pantry Oyster Sauce
1 pkt 400g Mr Chen's Pantry Ready to Eat Hokkien Noodles

recipeInstructions.text: Add broccolini and snow peas to wok. Stir-fry for 3 minutes or until broccolini is just tender. Return beef to wok with sauce mixture. Stir-fry for 1 minute or until sauce has thickened. Toss through noodles. Serve topped with sesame seeds and chilli.

Add broccolini and snow peas to wok. Stir-fry for 3 minutes or until broccolini is just tender. Return beef to wok with sauce mixture. Stir-fry for 1 minute or until sauce has thickened. Toss through noodles. Serve topped with sesame seeds and chilli.
